description: Deviation band strategy with EMA 9/20 crossovers for SPY with current timestamps

signals.reason: EMA 9 crosses above EMA 20 with price near lower deviation band - route start entry
Price reached upper deviation band - route end target
EMA crossover continuation with 1hr confirmation and deviation band support
Afternoon pullback to deviation band support with EMA confirmation

entry_conditions.description: Route start: EMA 9 crosses above EMA 20 with price at lower deviation band
entry_conditions.condition: EMA9_5min > EMA20_5min AND previous_EMA9_5min <= previous_EMA20_5min AND EMA9_1h > EMA20_1h AND Low_1h <= DevBand72_1h_Lower_6

entry_conditions.description: Deviation band continuation: EMA crossover with band support
entry_conditions.condition: EMA9_5min > EMA20_5min AND previous_EMA9_5min <= previous_EMA20_5min AND EMA9_1h > EMA20_1h AND Close_1h <= DevBand89_1h_Lower_6

entry_conditions.description: Deviation band reversal: Short at upper band with EMA confirmation
entry_conditions.condition: EMA9_5min < EMA20_5min AND previous_EMA9_5min >= previous_EMA20_5min AND High_1h >= DevBand72_1h_Upper_6

exit_conditions.description: Route end: Price reaches upper deviation band target
Lower deviation band support target for shorts
